choobinfo.message: 'Choob' originated when O'D said the word 'tube' with his native accent during a game of codenames. http://bit.ly/choob-origin

choobhelp.message: For a list of commands head to my channel! https://www.twitch.tv/choob_bot

I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only Choob will remain.

Darth Choobus was a Dark Lord of the Choob, so powerful and so wise he could use the Choob to influence the Choob-chlorians to create life. ... He had such a knowledge of the dark Choob that he could even keep the ones he cared about from dying.
